_header: Now well and now woe / now friend and now foe
_description: A song on Mutability — five 6-line stanzas (aabccb)

GULHun83.First Lines: Nowe well & nowe wooNow frend and nowe ffoo…
GULHun83.Last Lines:
…But gyle schall dwell with þe feyndein endelesse sorrowe
                    and woo
GULHun83.Note:
Not folio 21, as in Brown  and  Robbins (1943)
XCarleton Fairchild Brown,   and  Rossell Hope Robbins.
